</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the tooltip text associated with the specified tree view path. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvTooltip]] [idc, path] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, path]: [[Array]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - IDC of the tree view control. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Array containing path numbers. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - Tooltip text </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>


<comment><!-- START alternative syntax (optional) -->
</comment>
</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[tvTooltip]] path </value></part><part><name>Alternative Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Array containing path numbers. </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] - Tooltip text </value></part><part><name>Alternative Return Value</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________
